name: The Curse of Lord Divider
description:
The Curse of Lord Divider

You play as Radiant Zero. A hero to all the people. You arrive on scene as Lord Divider attempts to confuse and divide the people. 

Lord Divider CURSES you down to a speck of nothingness and banishes you to the well of despair to die an ignominious death. You must find other survivors and band together to once again find your true strength to defeat Lord Divider and bring understanding and peace back to the land!

-- Made for the Kenny 2020 Game Jam
